sloution.Eng: The thief has found himself a new place for his thievery again. There is only one entrance to this area, called the "root." Besides the root, each house has one and only one parent house. After a tour, the smart thief realized that "all houses in this place forms a binary tree". It will automatically contact the police if two directly-linked houses were broken into on the same night. Determine the maximum amount of money the thief can rob tonight without alerting the police. Example 1: 3 / \ 2 3 \ \ 3 1 Maximum amount of money the thief can rob = 3 + 3 + 1 = 7. Example 2: 3 / \ 4 5 / \ \ 1 3 1 Maximum amount of money the thief can rob = 4 + 5 = 9.
sloution.Chn: 一个盗贼发现一个新的作案场所，这个地区只有一个入口，叫做'root'，除了root之外，每个房子有且只有一个父节点，经过观察之后，这个机敏的盗贼意识到“所有房子按照二叉树排列”，如果同一晚，两个相邻的房子被盗就会招来警察 请计算出盗贼在不惊动警察的前提下能盗取猴子数量的最大值 例 1: 3 / \ 2 3 \ \ 3 1 能偷的最大猴子数 = 3 + 3 + 1 = 7. 例 2: 3 / \ 4 5 / \ \ 1 3 1 能偷的最大猴子数 = 4 + 5 = 9.

Thinking.Tip: 每一节点有0,1状态，每一节点的0,1状态与上下节点有关联
